title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Legislature is supposed to write laws, not the courts. Liberal judges never go against their own cause. Josh Hawley declares end of conservative judicial movement. Gorsuch ruled that transgenders were covered under Civil Rights Act of 1964, which did not even imagine transgenders. Legislature should have rewritten the law. Hawley, Cotton set up as heirs to Trump in 2024. Manhattan DA declines to prosecute vandals who defaced St. Patrick's Cathedral. Obama consent decrees over local PDs. Dems doing everything they can to divert from decades of failure. Shelby Steele on the failures of the Great Society. Poll shows Americans as unhappy as they've been in 50 years. Dr. Fauci says he wouldn't go to Trump rally, admits he lied about masks. Caller says unhappiness in America will reelect Trump. Media and Democrats want you to think they'll act normally if you get rid of Trump. Drudge hyping new outbreaks in China. Contradictory stories knock down talk of coronavirus spike. You can't believe any news. Lockdown wasn't intended to save lives.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Hoover Institution researcher finds lockdown didn't save any lives. Elites gearing up for another lockdown. IHME model is back predicting 200,000 deaths by October. Non-whites account for 64% of coronavirus deaths, headline designed to reinforce narrative of America as racist country. Caller on Millennials and Democrats. New listener finally sees the light. Congress actually legislating? Dems spent millions to start groups like Occupy Wall Street and BLM as response to Tea Party. Aunt Jemima was a real person. Will the NBA's plan to return really work?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Shelby Steele. Aunt Jemima was a real person named Nancy Green, worked as a cook for prominent family, got lifetime contract from Quaker Oats to play Aunt Jemima, made her rich. Used stature to advocate against poverty and for equality. NBA plan to play at Disney World full of rules and restrictions. The press is not press, they're not media, they're not news. NBC and Google conspire to demonetize The Federalist, Zero Hedge. Google controls 70% of all online advertising. When is Congress going after Google for anti-trust? NBA Disney World rules. Rush Store Father's Day sale.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
